alert.note: Alert for Lower Iberia; Lower Vermilion; Upper Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 01 at 7:23PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT WEST CENTRAL IBERIA AND SOUTHEASTERN VERMILION PARISHES THROUGH 830 PM CST... At 723 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 9 miles west of Freshwater City, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kaplan, Freshwater City, Intracoastal City, Forked Island, Pecan Island, Esther, and Henry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Lower Iberia; Lower Vermilion; Upper Vermilion
